divs: Sighting Detailssitting out side on deck,my son noticed the lights i have never seen round disc like lights redish in color move and disapear like this before there where 7 lights move acros the sky and then slowly dim and vanish i do not know what i felt i just feel that it was not normal objects of normal movement way courious to know if any body else seen what we saw a first for us
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Nampa
There were no other sightings in Nampa on or around March 22nd 2012
Summary: looking east 15 degrees upfrom horizon saw 7 redish lights appear move slightly across sky then dem and disapear
